intro: Psychotria aureola, commonly known as the golden psychotria, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of the Americas. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family and is characterized by its striking golden-yellow flowers. The plant typically grows as an evergreen shrub, reaching heights of up to 1.5 meters. Its leaves are usually elliptical with a glossy surface and dark green color. Psychotria aureola is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its vibrant floral display.
